attributes.action: pass legislation to ensure posting letters and packages from family members and partners to military personnel serving in combat zones is free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition relates to recent comments by the head of the army calling on the Royal Mail to offer free postage for military famiies - see the BBC news website for details (search for: UK troops stretched but winning ).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
